description: The vast majority of our society is filled with slaves who haven’t had an independent thought in years. They live day in day out following the programming the government and media has put in their heads. Listen you aren’t wearing a mask because you think you are a wonderful, conscientious person doing your part to save the world and you know it. You’re a moronic sheep, a covidiot bleating your grateful submission to your slave masters. The mask is a symbol of oppression, silence, slavery and compliance and it was never intended to prevent or mitigate a scamdemic, but to promote one. It’s about control and manipulation and they will play this new terror card every chance they get to snatch ever increasing bits of control and power incrementally over the population. The masks aren’t the endgame. The point of the masks is to teach the people that if you want to get some sense of normal, then you must accept abnormality and surrender complete control to the tyrannical regime that wants to control you in every way possible.
